q: What is the primary purpose of Looker Studio (formerly Google Data Studio)?
Looker Studio allows you to connect to multiple data sources in a single report.
The _____ panel is where you select charts and controls to add to your report.
Match Term:
Which Google product is Looker Studio most tightly integrated with for data storage?
You can use Google Sheets as a data source for Looker Studio.
The _____ mode allows you to modify the report layout and configuration.
Rearrange Workflow:
Which chart type is best for displaying a single key performance indicator (KPI)?
A Time Series chart requires a Date dimension.
The _____ property controls the color and font style of a chart.
Match Chart:
Which control allows users to filter the report by a specific date period?
You can set a default date range (e.g., Last 7 Days) for the Date range control.
The _____ control allows users to filter by categories like Region or Country.
Rearrange Add Control:
What is the difference between a Dimension and a Metric?
o: Dimension is qualitative (text), Metric is quantitative (number)
Dimension is numeric, Metric is text

q: Metrics are always aggregated (e.g., Sum, Count, Avg) in charts.
The _____ color usually indicates a Dimension in the data panel (often Green in Looker Studio).
Match Aggregation:
Which feature allows you to create new fields based on formulas?
You can use simple arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /) in calculated fields.
The _____ function creates a clickable link in a table.
Rearrange Formula:
How do you share a Looker Studio report with others?
o: Click the 'Share' button and enter email addresses

q: You can give users 'Can View' or 'Can Edit' access when sharing.
The _____ link allows anyone with the link to view the report (if permissions allow).
Match Permission:
Which connector is used to access data from Google Analytics 4?
Looker Studio connects live to Google Analytics data.
The _____ connector allows you to upload CSV files.
Rearrange Connector:
What allows you to display data from different data sources in the same chart?
A Blend requires a 'Join Key' (common dimension) to link the data sources.
The _____ Join is the default join type in Looker Studio blending.
Match Join:
Which option allows you to change the overall color theme of the report?
You can customize the 'Canvas Size' (width and height) of the report pages.
The source _____ option allows users to download the data from a chart.
Rearrange Theme:
What is the purpose of the 'Filter' (view filter) setting on a chart?
o: To restrict the data shown in that specific chart

q: A filter can Include or Exclude data based on a condition.
The _____ filter acts at the dataset level, affecting all charts using that source.
Match Filter Logic:
Which function is used to handle NULL values in a calculated field?
CASE statements are used to create conditional logic in calculated fields.
The _____ function returns the current date.
Rearrange Case:
What feature allows you to break down a metric by another dimension in a Time Series?
A Table chart can have multiple dimensions and multiple metrics.
Which chart type is best suited for comparing values across different categories (e.g., Sales by Region)?
Data Blending in Looker Studio allows you to combine data from different sources based on a join key.
The _____ interaction allows users to filter other charts by clicking on a dimension value in a chart.
Match Interaction:
Which function extracts the month from a date field?
You can change a field's data type (e.g., Number to Currency) directly in the data source editor.
The _____ function returns the current year as a number.
Rearrange Formatting:
Which report setting controls the grid lines behind charts?
Looker Studio supports 'Smart Guides' to help align objects on the canvas.
The _____ panel option allows you to snap objects to a grid.
Match Layout:
Which feature allows you to send a PDF version of the report to users on a schedule?
Scheduled emails can include a link to the live report and a PDF attachment.
The _____ option determines when the scheduled email is sent (e.g., Daily, Weekly).
Rearrange Email:
Which comparison feature calculates the percentage change from a previous period?
You can compare the 'Previous Period' (e.g., last 30 days vs prior 30 days) automatically.
The _____ metric option highlights changes (Green for up, Red for down).
Match Comparison:
Which Pivot Table feature allows you to see the relationship between two dimensions using color intensity?
Pivot tables in Looker Studio can display bars within the cells (Bar chart option).
The _____ row totals option adds a summary column to the pivot table.
Rearrange Pivot:
What happens when you 'Embed' a report?
o: You get an HTML snippet (iframe) to place the report on a website

q: Embedded reports can be interactive (filtering, sorting) just like the native report.
The _____ Embedding option generates a URL to be used in an iframe.
Match Embed:
Which feature helps you manage broken data sources or fields?
If a field is removed from the data source, charts using it will show a configuration error.
The _____ Data Source option allows you to update the field list (e.g., if new columns were added).
Rearrange Fix:
Which navigation type moves the page menu to the side?
You can hide specific pages from the report navigation in View mode.
The _____ navigation setting places page tabs at the top of the report.
Match Nav:
Which option allows you to make a copy of a report along with its data source settings?
When copying a report, you can choose to keep the original data source or select a new one.
The _____ owner allows you to transfer ownership of a report to another user.
Rearrange Copy:
Which feature allows community developers to build their own connectors?
Community Connectors can access data from sources Looker Studio doesn't natively support.
Looker Studio connects to _____ Partner Connectors.
Match Connectors:
Which date function returns the current date and time?
DATETIME_DIFF calculates the difference between two datetime values.
Which chart type allows you to show the composition of a whole over time (e.g., Sales by Segment over months)?
A 100% Stacked Bar chart shows the relative percentage of each category rather than the absolute value.
The _____ line chart option connects data points with straight lines.
Match Chart Option:
What is the maximum number of data sources you can blend in a single chart?
Blended data sources must share at least one common dimension (Join Key).
Blending acts as a _____ Outer Join between the primary and secondary sources.
Rearrange Blend:
Which function allows you to perform conditional logic similar to IF-THEN-ELSE?
CASE statements are often more readable than nested IF statements for multiple conditions.
The _____ clause in a CASE statement specifies the default result if no conditions are met.
Match Logic:
Which function is used to extract a specific portion of text using a standard pattern?
REGEXP_MATCH returns true if the field matches the regular expression pattern.
The regex pattern _____ matches one or more digits.
Rearrange RegEx:
What feature allows you to create a user-input variable that can be used in calculations?
Parameters can be used in calculated fields to make metrics dynamic.
You can allow users to select a parameter value from a _____ list.
Match Parameter:
Which setting must be enabled to use 3rd-party visualizations from the gallery?
Community visualizations are built by Google partners and the community.
The _____ component allows you to add a custom JS/CSS visualization.
Rearrange Viz:
How can you speed up a report that connects to a slow database?
Looker Studio automatically caches query results for a short period to improve performance.
You can manually refresh the data cache by clicking the _____ button.
Match Caching:
Which feature allows users to filter a numeric metric by a range (e.g., Sales > 1000)?
Metric sliders can be added to the chart header or as a separate control.
The _____ checkbox in style settings enables the metric slider for a chart.
Rearrange Filter:
Which conditional formatting option scales the color based on the value?
You can set conditional formatting rules to change the text color or background color.
The _____ mode in conditional formatting applies a specific color to values meeting a condition.
Match Style:
Which pivot table feature allows users to group/ungroup hierarchy levels?
Drill down measures allow users to see more detailed data points by clicking.
The _____ dimension allows you to change the grouping of a chart dynamically.
Rearrange Hierarchy:
Which summary calculation computes the running total of a metric?
Running calculations are set in the metric's 'Analytic Function' or 'Running Calculation' settings.
The _____ metric feature allows viewers to choose which metrics to display in the chart.
Match Calc:
Which function is used to concatenate two text strings?
You can also use the || operator or + operator (depending on backend) to concatenate text.
The _____ function converts text to all lowercase.
Rearrange Text:
Which operator returns multiple true values from a list?
The IS NULL operator checks if a field has a null value.
The _____ function returns the first non-null value from a list of arguments.
Which scorecard feature allows you to abbreviate large numbers (e.g., 1.5M instead of 1,500,000)?
You can control the decimal precision (number of decimal places) for metrics in a scorecard.
The _____ comparison option allows you to compare the metric against a fixed target value.
Match Scorecard:
Which map chart type displays circles of varying sizes to represent metric values?
A Filled Map requires a Geo dimension that represents an area (Country, Region, State).
The _____ tooltip option allows you to show additional metrics when hovering over a map location.
Rearrange Map:
Which function truncates a date to a specific granularity (e.g., first day of the month)?
DATE_DIFF(End_Date, Start_Date) returns the number of days between two dates.
The _____ function allows you to create a date from Year, Month, and Day numbers.
Match Date Func:
What feature allows you to add a horizontal or vertical line to a chart to indicate a goal or average?
Reference lines can be set to a constant value or a calculated metric (average, median, etc.).
The _____ line shows the general direction of data in a time series (Linear, Exponential).
Rearrange Ref Line:
How can you make a filter control apply to all pages in the report?
Report-level components appear in the same position on every page.
To make a component report-level, right-click and select _____.
Match Scope:
Which data credentials setting requires every viewer to have their own access to the underlying data?
Owner's Credentials allow viewers to see data even if they don't have direct access to the dataset.
The _____ credentials setting is best for public reports where viewers are anonymous.
Rearrange Creds:
What allows you to pass filter values to a report via the URL?
You can encode filter values in the report URL to open it with specific filters applied.
The _____ URL parameter usually contains the report ID.
Match URL Param:
Which feature allows you to see and restore previous versions of a report?
Version history saves a snapshot of the report configuration automatically.
You can verify when a change was made by checking the _____.
Rearrange History:
What happens if a scheduled email delivery fails?
You can edit an existing email schedule without creating a new one.
The _____ list allows you to add multiple recipients to the schedule.
Match Schedule:
Which layout option allows charts to automatically resize based on screen width (to an extent)?
The 'Actual Size' display mode keeps the report canvas at its fixed pixel dimensions.
The _____ navigation type is often used for reports with many pages (showing a list).
Rearrange Layout Mode:
How can you change the data type of a field that was incorrectly detected as text?
o: Edit the Data Source and change the type in the drop-down
Use a calculated field to cast it

q: You can rename fields in the data source without changing the column name in the underlying dataset.
The _____ description allows you to add metadata/definitions to a field.
Which function allows you to use regular expressions to replace text in a field?
REGEXP_REPLACE(Field, 'pattern', 'replacement') replaces all occurrences of the pattern.
The _____ chart type displays performance against a target with qualitative ranges (e.g., bad, good, excellent).
Match Bullet Chart:
Which dimension type is required for a Scatter Plot?
Scatter plots typically use two metrics for the X and Y axes.
The _____ metric in a scatter plot determines the size of the bubbles.
Rearrange Scatter:
What happens if your data extract exceeds the 100MB limit (for standard extracts)?
Google Analytics data sources are subject to the same 100MB extract limit.
The _____ indicator appears if Looker Studio is showing a sampled subset of your data (e.g., from GA4).
Match Limits:
Which feature allows you to customize the theme using a JSON file?
o: Edit Theme JSON (Not directly supported in UI, typically extract from image or presets)

q: You can generate a theme automatically from an uploaded image.
The _____ setting allows you to choose 'Start of Week' (Sunday or Monday) for the data source.
Rearrange Theme Gen:
Which filter control option allows users to match text using wildcards or regex?
In an Advanced Filter, you can select operators like 'Equals', 'Contains', 'Starts with', 'Regexp'.
The _____ option in conditional formatting allows you to color the entire row in a table.
Match Filter Op:
How do you manually assign a geographic role (e.g., Country, City) to a text field?
o: Click the data type icon in the Data panel and select Geo > Region

q: Looker Studio considers 'Continental United States' as a valid Geo field value.
The _____ chart type creates a tree-like structure to show hierarchical data.
Rearrange Geo:
Which comparison calculation displays the value as a percentage of the total for that column?
You can calculate 'Percent of max' in the comparison options.
The _____ calculation creates a running average.
Match Analysis:
Which function computes the length of a text string?
LENGTH returns the number of bytes, not characters.
The _____ dimension format displays the year and the ISO week number.
Rearrange Length:
Which export option prevents the report background color from appearing in the PDF?
You can password protect the exported PDF.
The _____ message option allows you to add custom text to the scheduled email.
Which function allows you to change the data type of a field in a formula?
CAST(Field AS TEXT) converts the field values to text strings.
The _____ function raises a number to a specified power.
Rearrange Cast:
What is a common cause for a blend returning no data?
o: Join keys have different data types (e.g., Number vs Text)

q: You can fix a join key mismatch by using a calculated field to CAST one of the fields.
The _____ control allows users to type a value to filter the report.
Match Control:
Which setting controls how often Looker Studio automatically checks for new data?
The default data freshness for most connectors is 12 hours.
The _____ setting allows you to filter out specific values (Exclude).
Rearrange Freshness:
Which Pivot Table option displays a heatmap specifically for the metric values?
Pivot tables support 'Metric Sliders' to filter data directly within the chart.
The _____ option adds a border around the chart.
Match Pivot:
How can you extract color styles from an uploaded logo?
You can disable specific fields in the data source to prevent them from being used in the report.
The _____ aggregation method calculates the average of values.
Rearrange Agg:
Which feature tracks the cost of queries processed by BigQuery?
o: Looker Studio doesn't track cost directly (checked in BQ console, but BI Engine helps reduce it)

q: You can create a report and hide specific pages from navigation to use them for drill-through.
The _____ date range option selects the current calendar quarter.
Match Date Range:
Which feature allows you to display an image behind the report content?
You can change the transparency of the background image.
The _____ ID allows you to refer to a field in community visualizations or API.
Rearrange Field ID:
Which comparison option calculated the year-to-date total?
o: Looker Studio metrics don't auto-calculate YTD (Requires Date Range or Calc Field)

q: The 'Is Null' filter operator selects rows where the field is empty.
The _____ shadow option adds a visual depth to charts.
Match Style Elements:
When embedding a report, what HTML tag is used?
You can customize the iframe width and height in the embed dialog.
The _____ function extracts a substring from text based on regex groups.
Rearrange RegEx Group:
What happens when you refresh the data source fields?
o: It updates the field list from the underlying connection

q: Refreshing fields preserves calculated fields unless they break due to schema changes.
The _____ setting allows you to control the pixel density of the report grid.
Which function converts a text string into a date object using a specified format?
PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', '20230101') returns a valid date object.
The _____ function formats a date as a specific text string.
Rearrange Parse:
What happens when you filter a chart that uses blended data?
o: It filters based on the configuration of the blend (Left Outer Join behavior)

q: In a Left Join blend, filtering the right-side table fields only affects the matching rows.
The _____ visualization type describes flow from one set of values to another.
Match Viz:
Which date range setting allows you to select 'Last 7 days' excluding today?
You can set a date range to start 'Minus 30 Days' and end 'Minus 1 Day' (Today - 1).
The _____ setting in Embed options prevents users from seeing scrollbars on the iframe.
Rearrange Date:
What is unique about connecting to a PostgreSQL database?
o: You may need to upload client SSL certificates

q: You can use parameters in a Custom SQL query for database connectors like PostgreSQL.
The _____ option in Google Analytics allows you to track views of your Looker Studio report itself.
Match Connector:
Which function constructs a clickable URL with custom display text?
You can use the HYPERLINK function to create dynamic links that pass parameters to another report.
The _____ feature allows you to highlight a specific range of values on a chart axis (e.g., safe zone).
Rearrange Link:
How can you show both numbers and a heatmap in a table column?
o: Select 'Heatmap' in the metric display options
You cannot, it's one or the other

q: Table metrics can be displayed as values, heatmaps, or bar charts.
The _____ color in the Report Theme settings affects the default chart palette.
Match Table Viz:
What is the benefit of filtering data in a data extract?
o: Reduces extract file size and improves performance

q: You can schedule an extract to refresh automatically (Daily, Weekly, etc.).
The _____ aggregation takes the largest value in the group.
Rearrange Extract:
Which text function replaces parts of a string based on position?
o: Review: There is no direct REPLACE_POS, usually SUBSTR + CONCAT or REGEXP

q: REPLACE(Text, 'old', 'new') replaces all occurrences of the substring.
The _____ function returns true if the text ends with a specific string.
Match Text Func:
How can you create a dynamic title that changes based on a filter selection?
o: Use a chart title linked to data (Not standard text box, usually requires workaround or KPI card)
Insert a text box with parameter reference (Not directly supported in text box)
Use a scorecard or table displaying the filter value

q: You can control the Z-order (Send to Back, Bring to Front) of elements on the canvas.
The _____ panel allows you to view all charts and data sources used in the report.
Rearrange Arrange:
Which connector connects to YouTube Analytics?
Search Console connector provides data on Google Search performance (Clicks, Impressions).
The _____ connector links to Google Ads performance data.
Which chart type is best for showing the distribution of a single metric (frequency)?
To create a histogram in Looker Studio, you typically create a calculated field to 'bin' the metric values.
The _____ function groups a number into specific bucket sizes.
Rearrange Histogram:
What allows you to highlight a background range on a chart axis (e.g., Target Zone)?
Reference Bands can be set between a Start Value and an End Value.
The _____ option controls the transparency of the reference band color.
Match Band:
Which feature accelerates BigQuery data sources by caching data in memory?
BI Engine is enabled by default for compatible BigQuery data sources.
The _____ setting allows you to see if BI Engine was used for a specific query.
Rearrange Speed:
How can you sort a Pivot Table by the row total?
o: Click the 'Row Total' column header in the chart

q: Pivot tables can have multiple row dimensions and column dimensions.
The _____ option hides the row numbers in a table.
Match Sort:
Which option allows you to give a specific name to a version in Version History?
Named versions are preserved even if older concurrent versions are pruned.
The _____ button restores the report to the selected version.
Rearrange Version:
What happens if you click 'Reset' in the Theme and Layout panel?
o: It reverts the report to the default theme settings

q: Custom chart styles override the theme settings.
The _____ theme is a dark-mode ready preset.
Match Theme:
Which calculated field function formats the current date-time?
Formatting functions return text, not date objects.
The date format string ____ represents the 4-digit year.
Rearrange Format:
Which setting prevents a chart from changing when report-level filters are applied?
o: No direct setting, but Grouping helps or Dataset/Chart filters override

q: Grouping a chart with a filter control limits the filter's scope to that group.
The _____ menu option groups selected elements together.
Match Grouping:
How can you show a metric as a percentage of the maximum value in a column?
You can add a 'Reference Line' computed as the Average of the data.
The _____ axis usually displays the dimensions in a vertical bar chart.
Rearrange Ref:
Which feature allows you to copy a style from one chart to another?
Paste Style Only is accessed via Right Click > Paste Special.
The _____ shortcut allows you to copy an object.
Match Shortcuts:
What is the purpose of the 'Display Mode' setting 'Fit to width'?
o: Scales the report to fit the browser window width

q: Fit to width may cause distortion or empty space on very large/small screens.
The _____ setting hides the header bar in the embedded report.
What happens to fields from the secondary table in a blend if there is no match in the primary table (Left Join)?
You can filter out NULL values created by a join using a standard filter on the chart.
The _____ file is required to define the metadata for a Community Visualization.
Rearrange Viz Dev:
Which embedding feature allows you to pass the viewer's identity to the report (for RLS)?
o: SSO Embedding (via Embed SDK or specific connectors)

q: BigQuery Partitions can improve performance if you filter by the partitioning column.
The _____ function returns true if the regex pattern is found anywhere in the text.
Match Regex:
Which chart type is best for analyzing the cumulative effect of positive and negative values?
Waterfall charts show a starting value, positive/negative changes, and an ending value.
The _____ option in report settings allows you to replace 'https://' links with a clickable mail link.
Rearrange Waterfall:
How can you implement Row-Level Security (RLS) in Looker Studio?
o: Filter by USER_EMAIL() in the data source or query

q: USER_EMAIL() returns the email address of the currently signed-in user.
The _____ SQL dialect is typically used for BigQuery custom queries (Standard or Legacy).
Match RLS:
Which feature allows you to organize report pages into collapsible folders in the navigation?
You can drag and drop pages under a section header to organize them.
The _____ 'Explorer' tool allows you to quickly analyze a dataset without building a full report.
Rearrange Nav:
What allows you to set up custom fiscal year dates?
o: There is no native 'Fiscal Year' setting, you must use calculated fields

q: You can calculate a Fiscal Year by adding months to the date field (e.g., DATE_ADD).
The _____ quota limits the number of API requests a community connector can make.
Match Date Logic:
Which option allows you to remove a data source that is no longer used?
Cross-filtering allows you to filter the dashboard by clicking on a chart element.
The _____ query parameter allows you to pass filters to a scheduled email report (if customized link is used).
Rearrange Remove:
What happens if you define a Custom SQL query that returns too many rows for Looker Studio to handle?
o: It may time out or show an error

q: You should use WHERE clauses in Custom SQL to filter data *before* it reaches Looker Studio.
The _____ function converts a number to text.
Which data source option allows you to limit the number of rows imported?
o: Custom Query with LIMIT clause (or some connectors have limit settings)

q: Looker Studio extracts (standard) are limited to 100MB of data storage.
The _____ function creates a geography field from latitude and longitude.
Rearrange Geo Function:
How can you make a chart title dynamic based on a selected filter?
o: It requires a workaround (e.g., using a scorecard with the dimension as the metric or community viz)

q: You can use the 'Page Name' as a smart text field in specific text boxes.
The _____ function returns the number of days between the current date and a specified date.
Match Math:
Which feature allows you to see the dependency lineage of a field (what other fields it uses)?
o: Metrics and Dimensions lineage is not explicitly visualized in a graph in basic UI, but you check calculated field formulas used

q: Calculated fields can reference other calculated fields.
The _____ operator represents 'Not Equal To' in calculated fields.
Rearrange Formula:
What allows you to configure specific colors for dimension values across the entire report?
Dimension value colors are persistent across different charts if they use the same dimension.
The _____ theme setting allows you to set the background color of the header.
Match Color:
Which option allows you to drill down into data hierarchy (e.g., Year > Month > Day)?
Drill down functionality works on any chart type.
The _____ dimension is the first level of the drill down.
Rearrange Drill:
Which visual element allows you to add a clickable image (e.g., a logo linking to a website)?
You can upload an image file directly from your computer.
The _____ property of an image allows you to specify a URL to open when clicked.
Match Component:
How can you group multiple charts to apply a filter only to them?
Grouping charts forces them to align to the grid.
The _____ menu allows you to align selected objects (Left, Right, Top, Bottom).
Rearrange Group:
Which option allows you to see the number of rows returned by the query?
Tables automatically paginate if there are more rows than can fit.
The _____ function returns the sequential number of a row within a partition.
answers: Looker Studio doesn't have ROW_NUMBER() directly (needs custom query or backend view)

q: Match Table Footer:
What is the purpose of the 'Google Maps' chart type compared to 'Geo Map'?
o: Google Maps offers more interactive features (Street View, Satellite) and higher limits

q: Google Maps in Looker Studio supports Bubble layers and Filled areas.
The _____ layer type in Google Maps shows a gradient of density.
Rearrange Map Layer:
Which text function removes leading and trailing spaces?
LTRIM removes spaces only from the left side.
The _____ function converts text to uppercase.
Match String:
How can you share a report with specific email addresses only?
You can prevent editors from changing access and adding new people.
The _____ access level allows a user to edit the report structure.
Rearrange Share:
Which chart type shows a progression of stages (e.g., Lead > Opportunity > Sale)?
A Pyramid chart is similar to a funnel but inverted.
Which community visualization allows you to display a radar chart?
Community visualizations must be enabled in the data source settings before they can be used.
The _____ visualization type is useful for showing task duration and project schedules.
Rearrange Viz:
What is the primary purpose of the 'BigQuery BI Engine'?
o: Sub-second query response times and high concurrency

q: BI Engine caches data in BigQuery memory, reducing the need to scan tables.
The _____ function returns the current date in the specified time zone.
Match BQ Feature:
Which data manipulation function allows you to combine multiple text strings?
You can use the '+' operator to concatenate strings in Looker Studio calculated fields.
The _____ function replaces null values with a specified replacement value.
Rearrange Text:
What happens when you change the 'Show Top N' setting on a bar chart?
o: It limits the number of bars displayed and groups the rest as 'Others'

q: Is 'Others' category customizable (can you rename it)?
The _____ setting allows multiple metrics to share the same axis scale.
Match Chart Setting:
Which option allows you to embed a YouTube video directly into the report?
You cannot autoplay embedded YouTube videos in Looker Studio reports.
The _____ component allows you to embed external content like Google Docs or Sheets.
Rearrange Embed:
How can you create a cumulative sum (running total) in a chart?
o: It's a native option in some charts (Running Sum) or requires self-join/window function in Custom SQL

q: Running calculations are natively supported as a 'Comparison Calculation' option.
The _____ calculation displays the difference between the current value and the previous value.
Match Calc:
Which connector allows you to visualize data from a local CSV file?
File Upload data sources are stored in Google Cloud Storage.
The _____ limit for a single CSV file upload is 100MB.
Rearrange Upload:
What is the purpose of the 'Search Console' connector?
Search Console data includes metrics like 'Average Position' and 'CTR'.
The _____ dimension in Search Console shows the search terms users typed.
Match Metric:
Which feature allows you to change the data source for all charts on a page at once?
o: Manage Added Data Sources isn't a bulk change tool; Grouping helps, or Select All > Properties

q: You can set a default data source at the Report level.
The _____ menu option allows you to make a copy of the entire report.
Rearrange Copy:
Which function computes the hyperbolic cosine of an angle?
Trigonometric functions in Looker Studio typically expect angles in radians.
The _____ function returns the constant value of Pi.
Which data blending join type returns all rows from the left table and matching rows from the right table?
Looker Studio blends support Full Outer Joins natively.
The _____ join type returns only rows that have matching keys in both tables.
Rearrange Join:
How can you display a metric's percentage change compared to the previous period?
o: Add a 'Comparison date range' to the chart

q: Comparison metrics are automatically colored green for positive change and red for negative (by default).
The _____ date range option compares the current period to the same period in the previous year.
Match Comparison:
Which community visualization is best for displaying a word cloud?
o: Word Cloud (by various authors, e.g., Supermetrics or EAKJ)

q: Word clouds typically size the words based on a metric value.
The _____ dimension determines the text associated with each word in the cloud.
Rearrange Word Cloud:
What is the purpose of the 'Extract Data' connector?
o: Create a static snapshot of data for faster performance

q: Extract Data sources must be manually refreshed or scheduled; they are not live.
The _____ refresh option updates the extract with the latest data from the original source.
Match Extract:
Which function calculates the natural logarithm of a number?
LOG10(number) calculates the base-10 logarithm.
The _____ function returns the remainder of a division operation.
Rearrange Math:
How can you display images from Google Drive in a table?
o: Ensure the image URL is publicly accessible or shared appropriately and use the Image() function
Use Drive connector directly as image source (Not direct for images in table)

q: The IMAGE() function requires the URL to be a text string.
The _____ function takes a URL and an optional alternative text for the image.
Match Image Func:
Which chart setting controls the number of decimal places displayed?
You can set decimal precision to 'Auto' to let Looker Studio decide.
The _____ option allows you to display numbers as a percentage (e.g., 0.5 as 50%).
Rearrange Format:
What is the purpose of the 'Google Sheets' connector?
o: Connect to data stored in Google Sheets spreadsheets

q: The first row of the Google Sheet is typically treated as the header (field names).
The _____ option includes hidden and filtered cells from the spreadsheet.
Match Sheets:
Which function converts a date to a number (e.g., for sorting)?
o: No direct 'Date to Number' standard func, usually Extract parts or formatting like FORMAT_DATE('%Y%m%d') and CAST to number

q: You can use YEAR(Date) * 10000 + MONTH(Date) * 100 + DAY(Date) to create an integer date key.
The _____ function extracts the quarter from a date.
Rearrange Date Key:
How can you add your company logo to the report header on all pages?
o: Place image on canvas > Right Click > Make Report-Level

q: Report-level components appear in the same position on every page.
The _____ menu allows you to change a component back to 'Page-level'.
Match Scope:
Which chart type is best for visualizing a process flow or user journey?
Sankey diagrams show the volume of flow between nodes.
The _____ chart shows the proportional area of categories in a hierarchy.

What happens if you use a blended data source in a chart and then delete one of the underlying data sources?
o: It switches to the remaining source

q: You can edit the blend to remove the missing data source and fix the chart.
Which feature allows you to control the order in which elements are loaded on the report page?
o: There is no explicit 'Load Order' control; elements load asynchronously based on query speed

q: Simplifying charts and reducing the number of elements can improve report loading performance.
The _____ mode allows you to view the report as if you were a specific user (to test RLS or filters).
answers: View as (or Test Email in some connectors)

q: Rearrange Load:
Which specialized function computes the distance between two geographic points?
o: ST_DISTANCE (if supported by backend like BQ)

q: Looker Studio supports all PostGIS geospatial functions natively in calculated fields.
The _____ function creates a line string from two points (common in BQ/GeoViz).
Match Geo:
Which data source setting forces the report to use the Viewer's credentials to access data?
Using 'Viewer's Credentials' requires the viewer to have direct access permissions to the underlying dataset (e.g., BigQuery table).
The _____ credential setting uses the report owner's access rights, regardless of who views the report.
Rearrange Creds:
What is the limitation of the 'GitHub' community connector?
o: It typically tracks repository stats (stars, forks, commits) but may hit API rate limits

q: Community Connectors can be built by anyone using Google Apps Script.
The _____ service is used to deploy and host Community Connectors.

Which specialized chart is used for stock market data (Open, High, Low, Close)?
A Candlestick chart requires 4 metrics: Open, Close, Low, High.
The _____ chart displays a single value with a progress indicator (circular or linear).
Rearrange Candle:
How can you implement a 'Dark Mode' toggle for users?
o: Not native; requires hacking with transparent buttons and parameter-based visibility or layers

q: You can use a parameter to switch between two calculated fields representing different colors.
The _____ function returns the current user's language setting.
answers: No direct USER_LANG function, implied by locale formatting
